profile:
Cape Breton Painters provide a complete line of interior and exterior painting services for both residential and commercial projects.

At Cape Breton Painters we work with our clients every step of the project to ensure their complete satisfaction. We do not consider our work finished until the job site is clean and the work is completed to your satisfaction. We take every measure to ensure that your time frame for completion of your project is met or exceeded.

We provide a free on site estimate that is firm, detailed and without further obligation. We can offer hourly rates, square footage rates or a combination of the two. We are committed to offering you an excellent experience with high quality products and services at prices you can afford. We aim to exceed your expectations but never your budget!
